channel.title: DevilsScape
channel.description:
Homepage: http://DevilsScape.co.cc
Forums: http://DevilsScape.co.cc
Download 1.0 Client: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/65718719/DevilsScape%20Client%201.0.jar
Webclient: (COMING VERY SOON)
Pictures: (ALSO COMING VERY SOON!
Server Features!:
100% PVP and perfect switching
100% Magic system
100% Skilling system
100% Combat system
Every Skill is trainable.
Some Skills Are buggy, but hey what can you expect? New server, New things!
Bosses:
Nex || Torva || Pernix || Virtus || Bandos
|| Saradomin || Zamorak || Armadly || Tormented Demons || Corporeal Beast
MiniGames:
Duel Area
Dominion Tower
Barrows
Warriors Guild
Castle Wars
Server Details:
New Runescape Armours
Active players
100% Trading
New NPCS
Polypore Staff
DFS with charges
Quests, Tutorials
Random events
!!!!!!PICTURES WILL BE UPLOADED VERY SOON!!!!!!

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You’re not allowed to advertise your donation system in your topic. Also, I suggest adding pictures and more detail.

Read full topic

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

May I just say, I hope you plan on buying a real domain and forums with all that Donation money you’re going to be getting (lol).

Protip: If It’s going to be terrible, at least don’t start groveling for donations right off the bat.

Read full topic
